Class PoisedProjects

java.lang.Object
PoisedProjects
public class PoisedProjects extends Object
This is the main Poised Projects class. It handles the creation of projects and the creation of projects parties. This main class also allows for viewing all ongoing projects and all overdue projects

    • createParty

      public Party createParty​(String partyType)
      A method that creates and returns a new Party Object. returns a Party object.
      Parameters:
      partyType - the type of party to be created (Either "Customer", "Contractor", or "Architect").
      Returns:
      Returns a new Party object.

    • createProject

      public void createProject()
      This method creates the parameters for the overloaded createProject() method then calls that method.

    • viewCurrentProjects

      public ArrayList<Project> viewCurrentProjects()
      A method that displays a list of projects in the console.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList<Project> of projects.

    • viewOverdueProjects

      public ArrayList<Project> viewOverdueProjects()
      A method that displays a list of overdue projects in the console.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList<Project> of overdue projects.

    • searchProject

      public Project searchProject​(String input)
      A method that that searches for a Project by name and by project number.
      Parameters:
      input - the name or project number to be searched.
      Returns:
      Returns a matching Project Object or null if no matches are found.

    • addProjectPayment

      public void addProjectPayment​(Project project)
      A method that allows a user to update the Project.amountPaid attribute of a Project.
      Parameters:
      project - the Project to be updated.

    • editProjectName

      public void editProjectName​(Project project)
      A method that allows a user to update the Project.name attribute of a Project.
      Parameters:
      project - the Project to be updated.

    • editProjectDeadline

      public void editProjectDeadline​(Project project)
      A method that allows a user to update the Project.deadline attribute of a Project.
      Parameters:
      project - the Project to be updated.

    • editParty

      public void editParty​(Project project, String partyType)
      A method that allows a user to edit a Party of a Project.
      Parameters:
      project - the Project Object to be updated.
      partyType - the type of Party Object to be updated.

    • finaliseProject

      public void finaliseProject​(Project project)
      A method that sets Project.completed to true and then the prints the invoice to console if payment for the project is still due. This method then adds the project to the completedProjects set and writes the project to file.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to be finalized.
